name: Tailed
description:
Tailed is a simple and addictive reflex-based survival game with amazing music. Originally designed as part of a one-day game jam, the rules are simple; you are being hunted. Survive! 

You only need mouse movement to play.

Avoid the oncoming enemies for as long as you can, and collect power-ups to aid you in your escape. Good luck!

(Dev best score is 1500)
